verses.verse: Paul <S%G3972><s%>, an apostle <S%G652><s%> (not <S%G3756><s%> from <S%G575><s%> men <S%G444><s%>, neither <S%G3761><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> man <S%G444><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> raised <S%G1453><s%> him <S%G846><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>),
and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the brethren <S%G80><s%> that are <S%G3588><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> me <S%G1698><s%>, unto the churches <S%G1577><s%> of Galatia <S%G1053><s%>:

Grace <S%G5485><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> from <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>,

who <S%G3588><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> sins <S%G266><s%>, that <S%G3704><s%> he might deliver <S%G1807><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> out <S%G1537><s%> of this <S%G3588><s%> present <S%G1764><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> world <S%G165><s%>, according to <S%G2596><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%>:
to whom <S%G3739><s%> be the glory <S%G1391><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%> and ever <S%G165><s%>. Amen <S%G281><s%>.

I marvel <S%G2296><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> ye are <S%G3346><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> quickly <S%G5030><s%> removing <S%G3346><s%> from <S%G575><s%> him that <S%G3588><s%> called <S%G2564><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> a different <S%G2087><s%> gospel <S%G2098><s%>;

which <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> another <S%G1487><s%> gospel only <S%G3361><s%> there are <S%G1526><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> trouble <S%G5015><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> would <S%G2309><s%> pervert <S%G3344><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

But235, 2532 though <S%G1437><s%> we <S%G2249><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> an angel <S%G32><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, should preach unto you <S%G5213><s%> any gospel <S%G2097><s%> other than <S%G3844><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> we preached <S%G2097><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, let him be <S%G2077><s%> anathema <S%G331><s%>.

As <S%G5613><s%> we have said before <S%G4280><s%>, so <S%G2532><s%> say I <S%G3004><s%> now <S%G737><s%> again <S%G3825><s%>, if <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man preacheth unto you <S%G5209><s%> any gospel <S%G2097><s%> other than <S%G3844><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> which ye received <S%G3880><s%>, let him be <S%G2077><s%> anathema <S%G331><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> am I <S%G3982><s%> now <S%G737><s%> seeking the favor <S%G3982><s%> of men <S%G444><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>? or <S%G2228><s%> am I striving <S%G2212><s%> to please <S%G700><s%> men <S%G444><s%>? <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> I <S%G700><s%> were still <S%G2089><s%> pleasing <S%G700><s%> men <S%G444><s%>, I should <S%G302><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> be <S%G2252><s%> a servant <S%G1401><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

For <S%G1161><s%> I make known <S%G1107><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, as touching <S%G3588><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was preached <S%G2097><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> me <S%G1700><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> man <S%G444><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> did I <S%G1473><s%> receive <S%G3880><s%> it <S%G846><s%> from man <S%G444><s%>, nor was I <S%G1473><s%> taught <S%G1321><s%> it <S%G846><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> it came to me through <S%G1223><s%> revelation <S%G602><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> ye have heard of <S%G191><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> manner of life <S%G391><s%> in time past <S%G4218><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Jews <S%G2454><s%>' religion, how that <S%G3754><s%> beyond <S%G2596><s%> measure <S%G5236><s%> I persecuted <S%G1377><s%> the church <S%G1577><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> made havoc <S%G4199><s%> of it <S%G846><s%>:

and <S%G2532><s%> I advanced <S%G4298><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Jews <S%G2454><s%>' religion beyond <S%G5228><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> of mine own age <S%G4915><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> countrymen <S%G1085><s%>, being <S%G5225><s%> more exceedingly <S%G4056><s%> zealous <S%G2207><s%> for the traditions <S%G3967><s%> of my <S%G3450><s%> fathers <S%G3862><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> it was the good pleasure <S%G2106><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> separated <S%G873><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>, even from <S%G1537><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%>'s womb <S%G2836><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> called <S%G2564><s%> me through <S%G1223><s%> his <S%G846><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%>,

to reveal <S%G601><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me <S%G1698><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> I might preach <S%G2097><s%> him <S%G846><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%>; straightway <S%G2112><s%> I conferred <S%G4323><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> with flesh <S%G4561><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> blood <S%G129><s%>:

neither <S%G3761><s%> went I up <S%G424><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> them that were <S%G3588><s%> apostles <S%G652><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> me <S%G1700><s%>: but <S%G235><s%> I went <S%G565><s%> away into <S%G1519><s%> Arabia <S%G688><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> I returned <S%G5290><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Damascus <S%G1154><s%>.

Then <S%G1899><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> I went up <S%G424><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> to visit <S%G2477><s%> Cephas <S%G4074><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> tarried <S%G1961><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%> fifteen <S%G1178><s%> days <S%G2250><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> other <S%G2087><s%> of the apostles <S%G652><s%> saw I <S%G1492><s%> none <S%G3756><s%>, save <S%G1508><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> the <S%G80><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%>'s brother <S%G80><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> touching the things which <S%G3739><s%> I write <S%G1125><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, behold <S%G2400><s%>, before <S%G1799><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, I lie5574, 3754 not <S%G3756><s%>.
Then <S%G1899><s%> I came <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the regions <S%G2824><s%> of Syria <S%G4947><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Cilicia <S%G2791><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> I was <S%G2252><s%> still unknown <S%G50><s%> by face <S%G4383><s%> unto the churches <S%G1577><s%> of Judaea <S%G2449><s%> which were <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>:

but <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G2258><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> say <S%G3754><s%>, He that <S%G3588><s%> once <S%G4218><s%> persecuted <S%G1377><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> preacheth <S%G2097><s%> the faith <S%G4102><s%> of which <S%G3739><s%> he once <S%G4218><s%> made havoc <S%G4199><s%>;
and <S%G2532><s%> they glorified <S%G1392><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me <S%G1698><s%>.
